sn51.21:1.2: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn51.21:1.3: ‘ko nu kho maggo, kā paṭipadā iddhipādabhāvanāyā’ti?
sn51.21:1.6: iti me chando na ca atilīno bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṁ saṅkhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhitto bhavissati.
sn51.21:1.8: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.21:1.9: yathā adho tathā uddhaṁ, yathā uddhaṁ tathā adho;
sn51.21:1.10: yathā divā tathā rattiṁ, yathā rattiṁ tathā divā.
sn51.21:1.11: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṁ cittaṁ bhāveti.
sn51.21:1.15: iti me vīmaṁsā na ca atilīnā bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitā bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṁ saṅkhittā bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā bhavissati.
sn51.21:1.17: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.21:1.18: yathā adho tathā uddhaṁ, yathā uddhaṁ tathā adho;
sn51.21:1.19: yathā divā tathā rattiṁ yathā rattiṁ tathā divā’—
sn51.21:1.20: iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṁ cittaṁ bhāveti.
sn51.21:2.1: Evaṁ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catūsu iddhipādesu evaṁ bahulīkatesu anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti …pe… yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vatteti.
sn51.21:2.2: Evaṁ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catūsu iddhipādesu evaṁ bahulīkatesu, āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
